title: Faculty Cannot Access Email
description: A professor reports they are unable to access their university email account.

tasks.description: Identify the faculty member and check their account status in the identity management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the account is active and not locked.

tasks.description: Guide the professor through clearing their web browser cache and cookies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear, step-by-step instructions for common browsers.

tasks.description: If the issue persists, trigger a password reset for the faculty member's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent initiates a password reset and confirms the user can now log in.
